review: I was prescribed Doxy for Bartonella. Within a few days I was taken off due to extreme nausea and diarrhea. It took almost 3 weeks for my GI system to recover.

Seems like it started with sinus. Low grade fever, cough, seems like I had this for months but just got worse. I ended up with very short of breath. Just walking a short distance. Had to try clearing my throat every morning then felt better. Finally got a script for Doxycyline  and it didn't take long for my shortness of breath to to become so much better so I could do things I didn't think I could do again.
